attributes.action: make are schools safer with panic alarms throughout the school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to start a campaign where we have panic alarms in our schools.
If an emergency was to happen, then the police would be able to know what
is going on straight away.
We had one disaster with Dunblane and if it was to happen again, then we may
have a better chance of saving life's.
Belgium recently seen an attack in a primary school and lets face it, our
schools are not safe.
I do not request a panic alarm in ever class but in  locations throughout
the school.
I would like the government to pay for this.
Even if we save one life, that's all what counts.

Your response would be appreciated

Stuart McKay
41 Shire Road
Corby
NN17 2HF

rejection.details: Pls remove your name/address from the main part of the petition
